remarks: ~ tbw-ax1 rederived from ~ merco1 . This theorem, along with ~ retbwax2 , ~ retbwax3 , and ~ retbwax4 , shows that ~ merco1 with ~ ax-mp can be used as a complete axiomatization of propositional calculus.  (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Sep-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: retbwax1 $p |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ( ( ps -> ch ) -> ( ph -> ch ) ) ) $.
